sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 確認各聲頻設備是否太靠近電視機。

sentences.english: A method and a device for audio coding are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 本發明揭示一種用於聲頻編碼之方法及裝置。

sentences.english: The quantizing noise is an important factor which influences the quality of digital audio.
sentences.chinese: 影響數字聲頻質量的主要因素之一是量化噪聲。

sentences.english: This technique relies on the acousticproperties of the egg.
sentences.chinese: 這一技術依賴於雞蛋的聲頻特性。
